arts.ttl: Stade de Reims paying tribute to former legendary striker
arts.sum: Stade de Reims will pay tribute to one of its most iconic footballers from the past this weekend. Just Fontaine played six seasons for Les rouges et blancs in what…

arts.ttl: Reims midfielder shaping up to be the next N’Golo Kanté
arts.sum: We may be seeing another superstar in the making at Stade de Reims, but one who fits a different profile than the legends of the past. Names like Raymond Kopa,…
